text: 10.30 2 Sto 25.9, Luk 18.30 God kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Kɨlop kod yek lum awl yenɨgabal ñɨn ak, nap, nonɨm, nɨmam, nɨnay, ñapay, kal, wog okok kuŋay yɨbɨl ñɨnɨgab agak. Pen binɨb yokɨp okok kɨli, binɨb God wog ak gɨpal okok kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agak. Ñɨn kɨdek ak pen apek, binɨb God wog ak gɨpal okok kɨli pel pelnep yenɨgabal agak.
